item.description:
Venez
... boire un martini, une bière, un cafe, ou un thé.
... faire la connaissance d'autres francophones.
... profiter d'une discussion en français avec des amis.
... ecouter un peu de musique.

Venez nous rejoindre!

Dover Soul is a couple of blocks south of the Cafe, same side of the street. Central Ave. is one way here, so if you're coming FROM THE SOUTH (Spaulding Tpk, Exit 7 or 8), you'll have to U-turn in Dover's downtown "square" (which is actually triangle-shaped!). See the Dover Soul website for detailed driving directions.

Park on Central Avenue in front of the place (avoid the new "30 minute" spots!), or turn right just after Dover Soul and Little Louie's (lime-green restaurant on the corner, attached to Dover Soul) onto Orchard Steet and park in a PUBLIC lot on the right (metered, but free in the evening). Avoid permit-only spots!

ATTENTION ! Dover Soul is two venues in one. We'll attempt to meet at the back of the coffee house (left side of Dover Soul -- the room where you walk in) but may move to the bar (right side) s'il y a du monde. On se verra de toute façon ... il n'est pas assez grand que ça.

For more information, see http://www.doversoul....

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language April Meetup #2
